name: SCHOOOL: Teach & Learn English
description: SCHOOOL provides an ideal platform for both English language teachers and students. We connect ESL teachers and students globally.   Teach and learn English on the go.  Interact with English language teachers and learners.  Use our smart learning tools and facilitate your study.  Create classes and study together with anyone in the world.   1. Teach, Learn and Interact  Interact with English language teachers and learners from around the world. Post articles about English and get feedback instantly.   English teachers, post lectures and meet your prospective students. Invite your students and interact with them on the go.   2. Create Class and Study Together  Do you want to have a group study with your friends? Then, create a class, invite friends and study together.   Are you an ESL teacher? Create a mobile class here and invite your students to it. You can post lectures, interact with your students and give them feedback on the go.   3. Use Smart Learning Assistants  NOTEBOOK Archive English expressions in the smart Notebook we provide. Notebook helps you to listen and repeat the expressions.   STUDYFLOW StudyFlow is a set of English expressions by topic and 3 smart learning assistants that facilitate learning. You can choose from pre-made StudyFlows that contain the most commonly used English expressions.   GLASS NOTES Glass Notes, the location-based virtual post-it notes, lets you find English expressions that are commonly used in the public place. The expressions vary based on the location types such as hospitals and shopping malls. You can also create your own Glass Notes and locate them anywhere. Use Glass Notes as your location-based virtual notes.   LINGO FINDER Do you have any doubts on the English phrases you want to use? Search them on Lingo Finder. Lingo Finder helps you to browse sentence examples that will clear up your doubts with English writing.   REMEMBER REMEMBER is an A.I. that helps you to repeat and memorize sentences. It trains your brain not to forget learned sentences, using scientifically-proven interval and repetition patterns.      /   / english on the go / schoool / Lingo Finder / Sentence example search engine
